Class InvalidTopicException

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.lang.Throwable
      • java.lang.Exception
        • java.lang.RuntimeException
          • io.spine.server.stand.InvalidRequestException
            • io.spine.server.stand.InvalidTopicException
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    io.spine.core.MessageRejection, java.io.Serializable

    public class InvalidTopicException
extends InvalidRequestException
    An exception thrown in case an invalid or unsupported Topic has been submitted to Stand.
    See Also:
